oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Du Pont, Old Hickory rayon plant is "World's Safest Plant," 1953 June 27
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph made at Du Pont's rayon plant in Old Hickory, Tennessee. Employees pose with a sign giving the latest statistics for their safety records. They anticipated being given the title of "The World's Safest Plant" at midnight that day. Pictured from left to right are Sgt. J. F. Moore; R. L. Magee, service superintendent; and F. M. Acker, plant manager. Forms part of the Nashville Banner Archives. 1 photograph : b & w ; 8 x 10 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Moore, J.F.; Magee, R.L.; Acker, F.M.
Old Hickory Plant (E.I. du Pont de Nemours & Company)
